name: WMIC Service Start/Stop
description: Detects usage of wmic to start or stop a service
query: ((process.pe.original_file_name:/[Ww][Mm][Ii][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR process.executable:/.*\\[Ww][Mm][Ii][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND (process.command_line:/.*\ [Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ [Cc][Aa][Ll][Ll]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:(/.*[Ss][Tt][Oo][Pp][Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt][Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee].*/)))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.pe.original_file_name:wmic.exe OR process.executable:*\\WMIC.exe) AND (process.command_line:*\ service\ * AND process.command_line:*\ call\ * AND process.command_line:(*stopservice* OR *startservice*)))`
